submodules.title: Neural Network Architecture
submodules.description: Designs and implements end-to-end neural networks that facilitate real-time decision-making for autonomous driving and robotics. This includes optimizing layers for speed and accuracy, ensuring the AI can process vast amounts of data efficiently.

submodules.title: Sensor Fusion
submodules.description: Integrates data from multiple sensors, including radar, LiDAR, and cameras, to create a comprehensive 4D perception of the environment. This submodule ensures that the AI can accurately detect and interpret obstacles, road conditions, and other vehicles.

submodules.title: Reinforcement Learning
submodules.description: Utilizes reinforcement learning techniques to enable the AI to learn from its experiences and improve its decision-making capabilities over time. This includes simulating various driving scenarios to enhance the AI's adaptability and safety.

submodules.title: Path Planning
submodules.description: Develops algorithms that calculate the optimal route for the vehicle to take, considering real-time traffic data, road conditions, and potential obstacles. This ensures efficient and safe navigation in various environments.

submodules.title: Obstacle Avoidance
submodules.description: Implements advanced algorithms that allow the vehicle to detect and avoid obstacles in real-time. This includes dynamic object tracking and predictive modeling to anticipate the movement of other vehicles and pedestrians.

submodules.title: Traffic Awareness
submodules.description: Equips the AI with the ability to understand and respond to traffic signals, signs, and the behavior of other road users. This submodule enhances the vehicle's ability to operate safely and legally in diverse traffic conditions.

submodules.title: Energy Efficiency Management
submodules.description: Optimizes the vehicle's energy consumption by analyzing driving patterns and environmental factors. This submodule aims to extend battery life and improve overall energy efficiency through intelligent driving strategies.

submodules.title: Tesla Bot / Optimus Control
submodules.description: Develops the AI framework that powers Tesla's humanoid robot, Optimus. This includes motion planning, task execution, and interaction capabilities, enabling the robot to perform complex tasks in industrial settings.

submodules.title: Industrial Automation
submodules.description: Focuses on integrating TeslaAI with manufacturing processes to enhance productivity and efficiency. This includes programming the robot for assembly line tasks, quality control, and logistics management.

submodules.title: Decentralized Edge Inference
submodules.description: Enables real-time processing of data at the edge, reducing latency and bandwidth usage. This submodule ensures that critical decisions can be made locally without relying on cloud processing.

submodules.title: Secure Data Sharing
submodules.description: Implements protocols for secure data sharing across Tesla's fleet of vehicles. This includes encryption and access control measures to protect sensitive information while allowing for collective learning.

submodules.title: Custom Hardware Optimization
submodules.description: Focuses on developing and optimizing custom hardware solutions, such as the Dojo supercomputer, to handle the vast computational needs of TeslaAI. This ensures high performance and scalability for AI tasks.

submodules.title: Over-the-Air Updates
submodules.description: Facilitates continuous improvement of the AI system through regular over-the-air updates. This ensures that all vehicles benefit from the latest advancements in AI technology and safety features.

submodules.title: Federated Learning
submodules.description: Employs federated learning techniques to allow vehicles to learn from each other without sharing raw data. This enhances the AI's performance while maintaining user privacy and data security.
